name: After School
description: After Programs available to Moscone students. - Community Youth Center-ExCEL program on site. Call 415-695-5736. - SFUSD Early Education Department Out of School Time Program: Las Americas, Pre-K & K-5th grade, 7:30AM-5:30PM. Call 415-695-5746. - Boys' and Girls' Club at Mission Clubhouse on Alabama (Safe Walk provided by Clubhouse). Call 415-400-8911 for details. - Mission Recreation Center one block away.
